items.sentence: It was in this room that we had the meeting last Friday.
I don\'t think it\'s going to stop raining anytime soon.
Tom didn\'t get a chance to thank Mary for all her help.
She\'ll be having dinner with him at this time tomorrow.
Since it\'s written in easy French, I can understand it.
Some parents don\'t punish their children when they lie.
Sooner or later, I\'ll probably get tired of doing this.
It would\'ve been nice if Tom had told us he\'d be late.
Tom had a hard time making himself understood in French.
Tom has already been told never to come back here again.
Tom has until October 20th to finish writing the report.
Tom has written an extremely detailed report about this.
Tom is convinced Mary is the one who stole his clarinet.
I didn\'t realize that Tom wanted me to do that for him.
I didn\'t see where the ball went after it hit the tree.
I didn\'t tell Tom everything Mary asked me to tell him.
I don\'t know what Tom knows, but Tom knows what I know.
Somebody might\'ve overheard your conversation with Tom.
Sometimes, it\'s hard to tell when Tom is being serious.
I started a new blog. I\'ll do my best to keep it going.
